turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey there! I was hoping you could order me a coffee from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, no problem! What location should I order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I have a meeting at Whole Foods in Shrewsbury, so let's do the Starbucks on Route 9 in Shrewsbury?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what kind of drink are you thinking about today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to try the Iced Cold Foam Cappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That sounds delicious. What size are you looking for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti - Iced please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! And do you like the regular amount of ice?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, thanks for asking, no, please order light ice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can do that! And would you like to add anything to the drink itself?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What comes standard?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ice, Milk and Brewed Espresso

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please request skim milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do! Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please have them add an extra shot of espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will do that! Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all! Please use my Starbucks account to order it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I am doing so right now, would you like a copy of the receipt?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please, have it texted to me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, you should get that text message any moment!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much for your help!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Enjoy your drink!

items.name: I would like to try the Ic
